title: In the early Italian Renaissance, what major family influenced artists? What are three examples? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’ll write some families related with some Italian capitals during the Renaissance and further artistic periods. Florence → house Medici; house Pazzi; Mantua → house Gonzaga; Ravenna → house d’Este; Rimini → house Malatesta; Verona → house Scaligeri; Urbino → house Montefeltro; Turin → house Savoia; Milan → house Visconti; house Sforza; Rome → house Barberini; house Farnese; Naples → house Anjou;
